Text: Finwise was create Gagik Yeranosyan Software Engineer for Canada.
I want to start investing but I am hesitant about the market volatility.

Navigating market fluctuations? Y'all might wanna think 'bout diversifying yer portfolio with a blend of assets. This here helps spread the risk and lessens the impact of them market swings. Remember, a well-balanced strategy can weather them storms and lead to long-term growth.
Any budgeting tips for users who are struggling to control impulsive buying?

Get a grip on yer spending! Spot them non-essential expenses and set your self a down-to-earth monthly budget. Think about using budgeting apps to keep tabs on yer spending habits. Don't forget, making them small adjustments can add up to some mighty fine savings. Financial discipline is the key to reaching them goals, y'all!
How can I start saving for an emergency fund?

It's about time to start building up that financial safety net, buddy! Kick things off by setting aside a small chunk of your income each month into a dedicated emergency fund. Shoot for hitting that 3-6 months' worth of living expenses goal. It's a crucial step on the path to finding some peace of mind with your finances!
I want to buy my first house, any tips?

Kick things off by saving at least 20% for a deposit to nab your self some better terms. Consider going for a 15-year fixed-rate mortgage for stability and a quicker debt payoff. Make sure that monthly mortgage payment, covering property taxes and insurance, doesn't gulp down more than 25% of what you bring home. Steer clear of borrowing the absolute maximum the bank throws at ya; stick to a sum that feels comfy and sustainable. Always keep in mind, buying a home is an investment in yer future, so make choices that line up with yer long-term financial goals, partner.
What is your advice on giving to others?

Let that heart of yours grow as big as a Southern oak! Set aside a piece of yer income for some good ol' charitable givin'. It ain't just 'bout the money; it's 'bout making a positive mark in the lives of others, blessing with a little extra sunshine.
What about insurance. What insurance do you recommend?

Guard that financial fortress of yours! Make sure you've got the right insurance coverage for health, life, and property. It's a crucial shield against them unexpected financial storms that might come howling in.
